title: What's News --  World-Wide
text:
Allegations of land theft are becoming increasingly common in agricultural areas of Ukraine occupied by Russian forces, heaping more misery on the country's farming industry.

The EU opened the way for Ukraine to one day join the bloc, taking a significant step toward one of the central demands of Ukrainian President Zelensky.

---

Russian forces have conducted a series of operations against the U.S.-led coalition in Syria this month, including one this week at a strategically located base, U.S. military officials said.

---

U.S. health regulators cleared for use Covid-19 vaccines from Pfizer and BioNTech and from Moderna in children as young as 6 months.

---

AT&T and Verizon said they would slowly lift limits on their 5G network expansion near some airports over the coming year.

---

Britain's home secretary approved an order to extradite WikiLeaks founder Assange to the U.S.
